decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Design and Access Statement, 2504/11 Rev B, 2504/12, 2504/10 Rev C, 2504/LP Rev A, 2504/13, gta Transport Statement dated January 2020, Supporting emails dated 24 June 2020 (Al Ghani Trade Centre) and 25 June 2020 (Premiunm Quality Foods), Email Jaswinder Bahara dated 11 November 2019

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Variation of Condition 1 of approved planning application 2157/10 to: retain the commercial and residential uses of the premises, the structure as built, the disabled persons access passenger lift to comply with equality acts, the fire escape routes and the conversion of the 2nd and 3rd floors into a total of 6 no. self-contained flats, alterations to 2 no. window openings to the rear elevation at 2nd floor level, to reduce the height of the cills and the installation of new windows to suit, alteration to existing window opening to rear elevation at 3rd floor level, to form door opening and installation of new pair of doors. The basement to be used solely for cycle storage in connection with the residential units and shared storage for the commercial units at the premises and for no other purpose. (Summary).
